name: Bore Worm
damage_immunities: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine
condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone
book: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage

traits.Regeneration: The worm regains 10 hit points at the start of each of its turns if it has at least 1 hit point.
traits.Tunneler: The worm can burrow through solid rock at half its burrow speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

actions.Multiattack: The worm makes two attacks: one with its grinding jaws and one with its stinger.
actions.Grinding Jaws: Melee Weapon Attack: +9+1d10 + 4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (3d8 + 9) slashing damage.
actions.Tail Stinger: Melee Weapon Attack: +9+1d10 + 4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 19 (3d6 + 9) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 19+1d10 + 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 42 (12d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
